history.proof: intros P Q R a b HredIn P1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. apply IHHredIn. apply Hincl. - apply redIn0. apply H. - apply redIn1. apply H. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn P1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) Q P1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hincl : incl P P1 Unable to unify "incl P P1" with "In (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) Q".

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn P1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R P1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hincl : incl P P1 Unable to unify "incl P P1" with "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".

original: intros P Q R a b HredIn P1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. apply IHHredIn. apply Hincl. - apply redIn0. apply Hincl. apply H. - apply redIn1. apply Hincl. apply H.
